channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Corporate America is making tons of easy money just by parking piles of cash and watching it grow
item.description: Interest income reaped by non-financial companies on the S&P 500 jumped about 60% in the first quarter.

item.title: Microsoft confirms layoffs in mixed reality but will keep selling HoloLens 2 headsets
item.description: Microsoft is investing billions to put in place graphics processing units for generative artificial intelligence. It's slowing investment in other areas.

item.title: Stocks end mixed in wild trading day marked by NYSE glitch, as jobs report looms
Outer Banks homes are collapsing due to climate change, but coastal property values are booming anyway
item.description: Oceanfront property markets are ignoring the threat of rising sea levels: “A view of the ocean is more desirable.”

item.title: Khosla Ventures backs weather balloon startup that uses AI to upend forecasts
item.description: Windborne's balloons can fly for weeks, as opposed to today's government-launched weather balloons which stay aloft for just a few hours.

item.title: Mexico ETFs face worst day in 4 years after election's result spooks investors
'Orbiting' is the latest dating nightmare fueling Gen Z's disillusionment with finding love on the apps
item.description: Tracking someone’s activity can activate a high-low doom loop that obsesses people.

item.title: CEOs of General Motors, Salesforce among corporate insiders selling stock last month
item.description: Insider buying and selling is tracked closely by many professional fund managers.

item.title: So you tried to buy the dip on Berkshire Hathaway? Here's the bad news.
Chipotle CEO reveals his go-to order and biggest challenge of working behind the counter
item.description: Brian Niccol developed a newfound appreciation for the fast-casual chain’s ingredients and preparation after completing behind-the-counter training when he became CEO in 2018.

item.title: The average 401(k) savings rate recently hit a record — how to know if you're on track
item.description: The average 401(k) savings rate recently hit a record high. Here's how it compares with the recommended retirement savings rate.

item.title: Roaring Kitty’s GameStop position hit $386 million in value
Airbnb CEO reflects on fumbled messaging during layoffs: “You don’t fire members of your family”
item.description: CEO Brian Chesky reflects on his comments about feeling "love" for laid-off workers.

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein victim sues psychiatrist Henry Jarecki for alleged rape, sex trafficking
item.description: Psychiatrist Henry Jarecki was identified in the suit as a friend of Jeffrey Epstein, who killed himself in 2019 after he was charged with child sex trafficking

item.title: These companies were hit by stock volatility on the New York Stock Exchange
